MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L30 postcode area of Bootle, affecting properties in Fernbank Drive and surrounding streets. It  was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3PM due to emergency repairs required to the underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:10PM on 14th December 2020
